title: Realme C35 and Realme C31 launched in the UK, packing average specs at affordable prices
content:
Following their Indian debut last month, the Realme C35 and Realme C31 have made their way to the UK. The latest entry-level smartphones from Realme offer good-looking design and competitive hardware at affordable prices, including a 50MP primary shooter and a large 5,000mAh battery. Realme C35 and Realme C31: Specifications Specification Realme C35 Realme C31

The post Realme C35 and Realme C31 launched in the UK, packing average specs at affordable prices appeared first on xda-developers.
